text: This is a list of Mexican Twenty20 International cricketers. ==Team history== Mexico's first T20I was against Belize on 25 April 2019 in the 2019 Central American Cricket Championship. ==Key== General * – Captain * – Wicket-keeper * First – Year of debut * Last – Year of latest game * Mat – Number of matches played Batting * Runs – Runs scored in career * HS – Highest score * Avg – Runs scored per dismissal * * – Batsman remained not out * 50 – Half-centuries scored Bowling * Balls – Balls bowled in career * Wkt – Wickets taken in career * BBI – Best bowling in an innings * Ave – Average runs per wicket Fielding * Ca – Catches taken * St – Stumpings affected ==List of players== :Statistics are correct as of 6 October 2019.Players / Mexico / T20I caps – ESPNcricinfo. Retrieved 25 April 2019.
